about_the_game:
Kick Off Land – Where Myth Meets Strategy!

Step into a world where legends come alive, and claim your place as the new king! Embrace your destiny to build and defend a flourishing city against relentless threats.

🌟 The Journey Begins: The New King – Manne

Start your adventure with the first chapter, "The New King: Manne," and unlock new chapters inspired by myths and legends from around the world!

🎯 Your Mission: Conquer, Defend, and Unlock

Seize the land, build a powerful city, and protect it from endless waves of enemies. Unlock powerful cards to strengthen your defenses and gain strategic advantages. Combine city-building skills with tower defense strategy to overcome every threat.
detailed_description:
Kick Off Land – Where Myth Meets Strategy!

Step into a world where legends come alive, and claim your place as the new king! Embrace your destiny to build and defend a flourishing city against relentless threats.

🌟 The Journey Begins: The New King – Manne

Start your adventure with the first chapter, "The New King: Manne," and unlock new chapters inspired by myths and legends from around the world!

🎯 Your Mission: Conquer, Defend, and Unlock

Seize the land, build a powerful city, and protect it from endless waves of enemies. Unlock powerful cards to strengthen your defenses and gain strategic advantages. Combine city-building skills with tower defense strategy to overcome every threat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Kickoff Land!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Kick Off Land is a strategy game blending city-building and tower defense mechanics. Build a thriving city, unlock powerful cards, and protect your land from relentless threats. Lead as a new king and conquer chapters inspired by myths and legends from around the world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
*languages with full audio support
